page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This area on the outrskirts of { {Middlesbrough }consists mainly of dense housing. The horizon is dominated by a stark contrast the { {Eston Hills}, which re used by many of the residents for a variety of leisure activities, such as walking, motor bike scrambling, picnicing, etc. The housing is mainly council properties of various styles and ages.The older properties have been modernised and many have been bought by the residents. The area is heavily affected by { {unemployment }and the descriptuons of the "flavour of life" reflect the affects redundancy has had on many families and communities. We can only hope prospects improve for all.
